metadata.title: CVE-2024-27432 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:ethernet: mtk_eth_soc: fix PPE hanging issue A patch to resolve an issuewas found in MediaTek's GPL-licensed SDK: In the mtk_ppe_stop() function,the PPE scan mode is not disabled before disabling the PPE. This canpotentially lead to a hang during the process of disabling the PPE. Withoutthis patch, the PPE may experience a hang during the reboot test.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
